description: This source file implements ASN.1 encoding and decoding for the DHKeyAgreement object, including creation, attribute setup, and child object management within an ASN.1 parsing library.

classes.name: ANSC_ASN1_DHKEYAGREEMENT
classes.description: A class representing ASN.1 sequence object for Diffie-Hellman key agreement parameters, including p, g, and optional priValueLen.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscAsn1CreateDHKeyAgreement(ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes an ASN.1 DHKeyAgreement sequence object with appropriate child objects.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscAsn1DHKeyAgreementCreateChildObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG index)
methods.description: Creates child ASN.1 objects for the sequence: p, g, and optional priValueLen.

methods.name: PANSC_ATTR_OBJECT AnscAsn1DHKeyAgreementCreateChildAttr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG index)
methods.description: Creates attribute objects for child ASN.1 sequence elements, typically for setting constraints or properties.

methods.name: PCHAR AnscAsn1DHKeyAgreementGetChildName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG index)
methods.description: Returns the name of the child element based on its index (p, g, priValueLen).
